Draft
This page is not complete.

Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The authenticatedSignedWritesread-only property of the BluetoothCharacteristicProperties interface returns a boolean that is true if signed writing to the characteristic value is permitted.
